title: This is happening! Searched for a fix, didnt find one on the support site.

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body: Click league, run normally or as administrator, this happens. This is after the patch today. Instead of the launcher opening, you just see this.

replies.body: Those blank screens usually mean your network is having problems getting a solid connection with the servers, so your client isn't able to figure out what it's supposed to display. Check out your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick using the linked guide, but also be sure to try adjusting your fire/antivirus exceptions or possibly disabling them while playing League.

I turned Malwarebytes off and I THINK I got windows defender to deactivate? Not really sure. Windows confuses me and I am already not tech literate at all. Now the download is at sixty two percent, so I'm GUESSING the whole thing might be slow net being slow.

Yeeaaa that could just be all it is tbh. Since it's at 60% now let it keep on trucking! 

If it does error out again, maybe try an ethernet (wired) connection if you haven't yet to see if that's a little faster?
It took 3ish hours, but we did it bois and grills, I get to spam AP Galio again to give people who play ranged top laners a taste of their own medicine. {{sticker:galio-happy}}
Update: I was able to log in after closing and reopenning a billion times, but now the Play thing is stuck at 0% and will not patch. Even though the patch finished downloading earlier today.
